Version 2.0.30 - Re-enable Direct Navigation Fallback

Bug Fix

  • Re-enable direct navigation fallback for SCORM slide navigation
  • Fixes first click not navigating to correct slide
  • suspend_data modification alone wasn't enough
  • Storyline reads initial position before JS intercepts are active

Technical Details

  • Add directNavigationTarget and directNavigationAttempted variables
  • Store navigation target before clearing pendingSlideNavigation
  • Trigger navigateToSlide() from Poll when position mismatch detected
  • Combines PHP-level + JS-level navigation for reliability

Previous Versions

  • v2.0.29: Comprehensive suspend_data field modification
  • v2.0.28: PHP-level suspend_data modification
  • v2.0.27: Correct suspend_data interpretation (Poll is truth)
  • v2.0.26: Skip score-based position during intercept
